visibility: hidden !important;

div.h2: Now accepting applications! Limited spaces available. To schedule a tour call (248) 674-2400.

div.p: Waterford Montessori Academy’s mission is to assist its students to reach their full potential in all areas of life, while promoting academic rigor, moral leadership, and personal responsibility.

p.span: Montessori is a hands-on approach to learning which is implemented worldwide and is meant to benefit every child, regardless of their background or affluence.
Waterford Montessori Academy is a public charter school authorized by Saginaw Valley State University and managed by American Montessori Solutions, Inc

The mission of Waterford Montessori Academy is to assist its students to reach their full potential in all areas of life, while promoting academic rigor, moral leadership, and personal responsibility.

div.style: text-align: center !important;

div.p: Waterford Montessori Academy is a public charter school authorized by Saginaw Valley State University and managed by American Montessori Solutions, Inc. READ MORE

div.style: position:fixed;bottom: -999999999999999999999px;

em.strong: Based on Governor Whitmer's announcment, both campuses will be closed through the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

strong.span: We are currently accepting applications for the 2020-2021 school year.

em.a: Click here for affordable internet at home for eligible households
